movie.title: Tokyo Rising
movie.description_intro: John John Florence puts his career on the line against Kelly Slater to qualify for surfing's debut in the 2020 Olympics.
movie.description_full: John John Florence puts his career on the line against Kelly Slater to qualify for surfing's debut in the 2020 Olympics.

movies.title: Save My Seoul
movies.summary: Save My Seoul follows two Korean-American brothers as they discover rampant prostitution and sex trafficking in Seoul, South Korea. With the use of hidden cameras and access to pimps, johns, and sex-workers, Eddie and Jason explore and unravel the complexity of the sex trade in Seoul. They learn that this problem is rooted in issues far deeper than lost girls and lustful men. Instead, it's a consequence of the broken Korean culture that turns a blind eye to and condones one of the biggest human injustices of our generation.
movies.description_full: Save My Seoul follows two Korean-American brothers as they discover rampant prostitution and sex trafficking in Seoul, South Korea. movies.title: Gut Hack
movies.summary: A bio-hacker seeks to cure himself by swapping his microbiome with a donor's, a controversial and dangerous technique.
movies.description_full: A bio-hacker seeks to cure himself by swapping his microbiome with a donor's, a controversial and dangerous technique.

movies.title: Mission Control: The Unsung Heroes of Apollo
movies.title_english: Mission Control: The Unsung Heroes of Apollo
movies.title_long: Mission Control: The Unsung Heroes of Apollo (2017)
movies.summary: At the heart of the Apollo program was the special band of brothers in Mission Control. The feature documentary film Mission Control: The Unsung Heroes of Apollo tells their stories, describing the rural homesteads and smokestack towns they came from, and the remarkable team they became. The film consists of interviews with those who worked in Mission Control and astronauts, enhanced by extraordinary archive, stunning VFX and an original orchestral score. The film covers the first journeys to the moon by Apollo 8 and Apollo 11, and the huge effort required to save the crew of Apollo 13.
movies.description_full: At the heart of the Apollo program was the special band of brothers in Mission Control. movies.title: Kevin Smith: Silent But Deadly
movies.summary: Kevin Smith is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his heart attack in February. Before he nearly died backstage, onstage he discusses his marriage, his kid and his work (or lack thereof).
movies.description_full: Kevin Smith is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his heart attack in February. Before he nearly died backstage, onstage he discusses his marriage, his kid and his work (or lack thereof).
